original_text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations; and then shall the end come.
korean_text: 이 천국 복음이 모든 민족에게 증언되기 위하여 온 세상에 전파되리니 그제야 끝이 오리라

sentences.original_text: And this gospel of the kingdom
shall be preached in all the world
for a witness unto all nations
and then shall the end come
